title: Wear screenshot free
summary: Take screenshots from your smartwatch and share it with your friends.
description: You bought a brand new and cool smartwatch and you want to share with your friends or followers how it is, but what the hell, you can not make any screenshot easily and show to your friends your watch faces or hoit looks android wear.This is the main reason why I made this app, but first, we need to make some things.The way to use the app is so simple, go to android wear app, and click on take a screenshot. Then, click on notification and select Wear Screenshot, automatically the image will be stored at the phone and you can share where you want.
descriptionHTML:
You bought a brand new and cool smartwatch and you want to share with your friends or followers how it is, but what the hell, you can not make any screenshot easily and show to your friends your watch faces or hoit looks android wear.

This is the main reason why I made this app, but first, we need to make some things.

The way to use the app is so simple, go to android wear app, and click on take a screenshot. Then, click on notification and select Wear Screenshot, automatically the image will be stored at the phone and you can share where you want.
comments: This app may or may not work, as the instructions are gibberish and the pictures are not English it is hard to say.  In any case it can't be installed on my watch (Wear 2.0) LG WATCH URBANE. Website broken so app is probably abandoned.
recentChanges: - New easier way to take a screenshot.
- Now you can open the images in gallery.
